{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Acer |model=AerialCast |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/24/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Lite-On |manuf_model=WN4507L |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=media streamer |fcc_id=PPQ-WN4507L |ic_id=4491A-WN4507L |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTD1185PA;RTD1185PA, D8E80P4, GD57D TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=128 MiB |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model=F59L1G81A-25T |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=128 MiB |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6GC16EWXA-12H |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192DU |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=HDMI out |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} This device looks to be another screen streaming device a la [[Google Chromecast (H2G2-42)|'''Google''''s Chromecast]].
"WN4507L V01" and "323C163791YD" is silkscreened on the device's board in the FCC photos.
==Likely included PSU(s)== The power supply shown with the device in the FCC photos is a '''DVE''' DSA-5PFK-05 FUS 050100a.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand=DVE |model=DSA-5PFK-05 FUS 050100a |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.2 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5 |output_a=1 |output_c=DC |output_conn=USB Female A |e_level=5 |manuf_country=China }}
